quote: Art is either revolution or plagiarism.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: Life is creation – self and circumstances, the raw material.
author: Dorothy Richardson

quote: An artist cannot fail; it is a success to be one.
author: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: Art is the only serious thing in the world. And the artist is the only person who is never serious.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You can look at a picture for a week and never think of it again. You can also look at the picture for a second and think of it all your life.
author: Joan Miro

quote: Where the spirit does not work with the hand, there is no art.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: Scott Adams

quote: It is better to be high-spirited even though one makes more mistakes, than to be narrow-minded and all to prudent.
author: Vincent van Gogh

quote: The greater the artist, the greater the doubt. Perfect confidence is granted to the less talented as a consolation prize.
author: Robert Hughes

quote: Art is standing with one hand extended into the universe and one hand extended into the world, and letting ourselves be a conduit for passing energy.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You have to systematically create confusion, it sets creativity free. Everything that is contradictory creates life.
author: Salvador Dalí

quote: Never worry about being obsessive. I like obsessive people. Obsessive people make great art.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: I think being different, going against the grain of society is the greatest thing in the world.
author: Elijah Wood

quote: In the mind of every artist there is a masterpiece.
author: Kai Greene

quote: The world always seems brighter when you’ve just made something that wasn’t there before.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
author: Henry Ward Beecher
